title: lovetrust
description: Lovetrust is a novel about the distance we place between each other. This post-Empire story gives a complete view of at the broken way the Millennial generation gives and gets love. Part campus novel, and part coming of age tale, Lovetrust follows a group of college students searching for reciprocal affection and intimacy in a confusing world. Readers of Ellis' The Rules of Attraction and Fitzgerald's classic The Beautiful And Damned will be thrilled with this generation-defining novel.
author: T/James Reagan
